author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter shower drain tile tips…I apply mortar at the four corners of the grate and embed that into the shower drain. This keeps the assembly strong. I also center the grate on the shower pan. Then I set four tiles and tap the grate to make it slightly lower so water will drain properly. Many thanks to Schluter for sponsoring this video 🔥 #tileshower #schlutersystems #bathroomremodel #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Schluter Shower Drain Tile Tips - #shorts #schlutersystems #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
